resources.string: This application requires audio permissions to be enabled in order to function. Please head over to your Android Settings and enable recording audio permissions for SoundPad
This app is using personalized ads to bring you a better experience as well as to support development. Please head over to your Android settings and enable tracking for SoundPad
1. SoundPad will record up to 20 custom recordings and save them for you.
2. Deleting the application and re-installing will remove all saved recordings.
3. If you wish to delete recordings tap the button below. The delete buttons are mapped respectively to each recording box.
4. Based on user feedback; support for importing custom sounds will be included.
5. If you are recoding something and you do not hear a playback. Make sure your phone is not on silent and your volume is not muted.
